bibl.title: The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume XXIV (Nos 2383-2425)

series.title: Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No.

bibl.seg: Lobel E., C.H. Roberts, E.G. Turner and J.W.B. Barns, The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Part XXIV (Nos 2383-2425). (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 35.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 1957, 8°, xiii-216 pp. et XVI pll.

C.R. par W.S. Barrett, Gnomon 33 (1961) pp. 682-692. - William M. Calder III, CP55 (1960) pp. 127-128. - Lloyd W. Daly, AJP 81 (1960) pp. 89-93. - Édouard des Places, Orientalia N.S., 27 (1958) pp. 323-324. - D.L. Page, CR N.S., 9 (1959) pp. 15-23. - Claire Préaux, ChrEg 34 (1959) No. 67, pp. 148-153. - Edoardo Volterra, Iura 9 (1958) pp. 279-284. - Hans Julius Wolff, ZSav 76 (1959) pp. 569-571.
